targets.expr: sum by (reason) (rate(loki_ingester_chunks_flushed_total{cluster_id="$cluster_id", cluster="$cluster", job=~"$namespace/(loki|enterprise-logs)-write"}[$__rate_interval])) / ignoring(reason) group_left sum(rate(loki_ingester_chunks_flushed_total{cluster_id="$cluster_id", cluster="$cluster", job=~"$namespace/(loki|enterprise-logs)-write"}[$__rate_interval]))
